input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 25 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Berlin for 7 days. You have to attend a workshop in Berlin between day 1 and day 7. You want to spend 7 days in Stockholm. You want to spend 7 days in Riga. You plan to visit relatives in Riga between day 13 and day 19. You plan to stay in Tallinn for 7 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Berlin and Stockholm, Berlin and Tallinn, Berlin and Riga, Stockholm and Tallinn, from Riga to Tallinn, Stockholm and Riga.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 25 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
